title: A Seed Grows
description: A Seed Grows describes the life cycle of a plant, from a seed falling on the ground to the production of roots and leaves, and finally to the production of a new seed. The book ends with readers contemplating what will happen next.
reviewWords: flowers, leaves, plant, rain, roots, seed, soil, stem, sunshine
phonics: Vowel Digraphs : Identify the vowel digraphs ee and ea
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Read and identify content vocabulary
